HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 99 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 2000 Kč.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cena se řídí tarifem podle vzdálenosti.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Zásilkovna: 69 Kč. PPL ParcelShop a Česká pošta (na poštu): 99 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 2000 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 99 Kč. Zdarma pro objednávky nad 2000 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Zdarma při platbě online, 29 Kč poplatek při platbě na prodejně.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Zboží z jiné prodejny je k vyzvednutí následující den odpoledne při objednání do 12:00.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Bikero.cz provides several delivery methods including standard home delivery, parcel shop/locker delivery, in-store pickup, and a specialized service for bulky items (bicycles).
PROVIDERS: Main carriers are PPL, Česká pošta, and Zásilkovna. They also offer a proprietary 'Bikero Kurýr' for bike deliveries.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs 99 Kč (PPL, Česká pošta) or 69 Kč (Zásilkovna). In-store pickup is free when paid online, otherwise a 29 Kč fee applies. All orders over 2000 Kč qualify for free shipping. Cash on delivery has a 39 Kč surcharge.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the 'Bikero Kurýr' service, which delivers fully assembled and adjusted bicycles directly to the customer's home. The company also offers an extended 60-day return policy and provides a free return shipping label for orders over 2000 Kč.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is consolidated on the 'Vše o nákupu' (All about shopping) page. While comprehensive, the information could be structured more clearly to easily distinguish between the services offered by each carrier (e.g., home vs. pickup point). A notable omission is the lack of specific delivery time estimates for standard shipping.
